title: Beautiful Island
description: Villagers pitch in with weeding, watering flowers, and clearing trash from the waters.

title: Early Bird
description: Residents are more active in the morning and businesses open earlier.

title: Night Owl
description: Boosts nightlife since residents stay up later. Island businesses extend their hours.

title: Bell Boom
description: Cost of goods on the island go up. But also the amount you get from selling increases.
